Body:
def preproc(text):
    return re.sub('(?<=\\n)\\s*#[^#]', '##', text)
template = """
    hi
    # old style comment
# another comment
"""
nodes = Lexer(template, preprocessor=preproc).parse()
self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Text('\n    hi\n', (1, 1)), Comment(
    'old style comment', (3, 1)), Comment('another comment', (4, 1))]))
